title: Khanya Mkangisa (31) and J Molley (21) spark dating rumours
text:
Khanya Mkangisa (31) and J Molley (21) spark dating rumours share this

Cape Town - Local TV personality Khanya Mkangisa and rapper J Molley have sparked romance rumours, and the age gap has the Twitter street shook.

The two, who have a ten year age difference, were seen attended an event together on Monday.

Twitter was a chatter with users commenting on the glaring age difference, as well as Khanya's behaviour in the video.

Khanya and J Molley hit the top of the Twitter trends, after sharing videos of each other on their Instagram Stories, seemingly in love and caught in an embrace.

Khanya responded to her trending status on Instagram Stories by saying: "Fuck you, fuck all of you," while showing an obscene hand gesture.

J Molley was previously romantically linked to V-Entertainment presenter, Shamiso, who also trended on Twitter following the reports.

The conversation online then quickly moved to local entertainer Zodwa Wabantu who has said she exclusively dates younger men.
description: Local TV personality Khanya Mkangisa and rapper J Molley have sparked romance rumours, and the age gap has the Twitter street shook.
